data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cavalleri, Adriano, Kaminski, Lucas A., Mendonça, Milton S. (2012): A new ectoparasitic Aulacothrips (Thysanoptera: Heterothripidae) from Amazon rainforest and the significance of variation in antennal sensoria. Zootaxa 3438: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213526
